document.full_text: peter vidmar resigned as chef de mission for the united states 2012 london olympics team on friday, saying he did not want controversy over his opposition to gay marriage to be a distraction to athletes.
document.title: peter vidmar resigns as 2012 games chef de mission
lines_and_colors: peter vidmar resigned as chef de mission for the united states 2012 london olympics team on friday, saying he did not want controversy over his opposition to gay marriage to be a distraction to athletes.
